description: With UPF50+, raglan sleeves, and thumbholes, the Lost Sol knits are offered in modern, athletic silhouettes that transition seamlessly from the trail to the water and beyond. Lost Sol woven shirts provide UPF40+ protection with cooling back vents in a timeless heathered ripstop fabrication that wears as well in town as it does on the trail. Loaded with versatility and protection, the Lost Sol tops are sure to find a spot in your bag every time you pack for adventure
name: Prana Lost Sol SS Shirt - Standard - Mens
